message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it. However, $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to pay $85 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your perspective. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $87.50. What do you think?
